mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(hct.assign_nid) AS total FROM ht_credit_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hct.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_r_user huc ON hct.credit_user_id = huc.user_id

select SUM(hct.assign_capital) AS sumAssignCapital, SUM(hct.assign_account) AS sumAssignAccount, SUM(hct.assign_interest) AS sumAssignInterest, SUM(hct.assign_price) AS sumAssignPrice, SUM(hct.assign_pay) AS sumAssignPay, SUM(hct.assign_repay_account) AS sumAssignRepayAccount, SUM((select sum(manage_fee) from ht_credit_repay where assign_nid= hct.assign_nid)) AS sumCreditFee FROM ht_credit_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hct.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_r_user huc ON hct.credit_user_id = huc.user_id
